content.text: Whats your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love taking my dog to the dog park. Do you have a pet?
No I do not, I recently told a cop that my car was sentient and was driving itself.
Hahaha thats a good one! I have a dog and two cats.
Cool! What kind of dog? Ive always had cats.
Shes a french bulldog. What kind of cats do you have?
One is an orange tabby and the other is a calico.
Aww they sound adorable. I wish I could have more pets but my apartment is too small.
Yeah I know what you mean. My apartment is pretty small too.
We can hang out at the beach sometime if youd like. I love going there.
That sounds fun! I love the beach too.
Great! We can exchange numbers and plan something.
